name: GEMINI (itch) (Cthethan)
description:
Switch back and forth between playing as either Twin in order to fend off waves of ghastly ghosts attacking from all sides as Red Twin and keep yourselves alive as Blue Twin. Balance staying close to your twin to heal up as Blue and keeping a safe distance in to keep up the offense as Red. How long can you survive?

CONTROLS:
W A S D - Up, Left, Down, Right
X - Switch Twin
K - Use Twin ability

Enjoy!
